events.text: if you hold it for a second and don't drag it anywhere, when you release it should snap back instead of auto-moving
set tweens to go the same speed, not take the same duration
improved peek mode, i.e. allow moving the card a bit farther away before auto-moving it (e.g. wanting to see the card below in Napoleon's Square)
for drag&drop, prefer tableau stacks that aren't the one you're dragging from
can probably remove isCardMovable boolean since it should always have the same value as drag&drop enabled?
